headline: North America Control Valve Market Forecasts Report 2025-2030 | Emerson & Flowserve Lead Innovations, IoT-Enabled Smart Valve Solutions Drive Competitiveness
summary: The North America Control Valve Market is set to grow from USD 2.305 billion in 2025 to USD 3.018 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 5.54%. This comprehensive study analyzes trends, technologies, and competitive strategies across types, operations, end-users, and countries. Key players like Emerson and Flowserve are advancing IoT-enabled solutions for industrial automation.
